title: Makoto - Wikipedia
snippet: Makoto ... Makoto (まこと, マコト) is a unisex Japanese name, although it is more commonly used by males. As a noun, Makoto means "sincerity" (誠) or "truth" (真, 眞).

title: Makoto
snippet: Makoto Okuwa ushers Japanese cuisine into the 21st century at his eponymous eatery, located in the luxurious Bal Harbour Shops. One of Miami’s most accomplished chefs, Okuwa, a master of Edomae-style sushi, reshapes tradition for a savvy audience eager for something new.

title: Makoto - Bal Harbour Restaurant - Bal Harbour, FL | OpenTable
snippet: 4 days ago · Makoto in Bal Harbour offers "incredible food," a "super cozy atmosphere," and "wonderful service," with highlights like "spicy edamame" and "crispy tuna rice."

title: Meaning, origin and history of the name Makoto
snippet: Jul 18, 2025 · From Japanese 誠 (makoto) meaning "sincerity", as well as other kanji or kanji combinations.

title: Makoto Name, Meaning, Origin, History, And Popularity
snippet: May 7, 2024 · Makoto is a unisex Japanese name that means ‘sincerity’ or ‘truth.’. It is associated with qualities such as honesty, sincerity, and truthfulness. Naming a child Makoto often reflects parents’ desire to see their children grow into truthful and sincere individuals.

title: Makoto+ – Magazine for Learners of Japanese
snippet: I have every issue of Makoto (70 and counting) and they add so much to learning Japanese. The content is varied and interesting, and everything is broken down so that it's easy to understand how Japanese sentences work and to get a feel for the language.
